Guidelines:
Q.1 What is A+ Content?

Ans: A+ Content is a detailed description of the product's features by using rich images, youtube videos and information about the brand.

Q.2 Who creates the A+ Content?

Ans: The brand can either hire an agency or create the content inhouse through their web developers and designers. Nykaa does not creates A+ content for any brands.

Q.3 How is the A+ content created?

Ans: The A+ content needs to be designed by a Web designer using a tool like photoshop. Once the design is confirmed the A+ content needs to be coded by a Web Developer using html, css and media queries only.

Q.4 What is the canvas size to design A+ content?

Ans: The Web Designer needs to incorporate the A+ content in the canvas width size of 770px.

Q.5 What is the image size for A+ content?

Ans: Each image size has to be less than 300KB.

Q.6 Does Nykaa have any sample design or html for A+ content?

Ans: Yes. The same can be downloaded from the link below.
A+Content Sample PSD
A+Content Sample Html

Q.7 Are there any guidelines to be followed for creating A+ content?

Ans: Yes, Refer the below link for the same.
Note: These are technical guidelines for the Web Designer and Web Developer.

Q.8 What is the process to upload A+ content on Nykaa Website?

  1. Once the A+ content is created as per the guidelines, the brand needs to share the content with the brand manager for validation.
  2. The Brand Manager needs to validate the A+ content using the UI Validation tool.https://uitools.nykaa.com/. In case the user doesnâ€™t have access to the same, kindly mail to ui@nykaa.com to receive access for validation.
  3. The Brand Manager needs to validate two things using the UI Validation Tool a) Code Review b) Responsive html.
  4. Validated A+ content needs to be sent to the UI Team for final approval.
  5. The approved A+ content will be sent by the UI Team to the cataloging team for upload on the relevant product description page.
  6. Once uploaded the Cataloging team will confirm the same on mail.
